title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, shopping cart, and payment integration.

title: Real-Time Chat App
description: A real-time messaging application with WebSocket support, rooms, and user presence indicators.

title: Task Management Dashboard
description: A Kanban-style project management tool with drag-and-drop, team collaboration, and analytics.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: A beautiful weather application with 7-day forecasts, location search, and animated weather visualizations.

title: Dev Blog Platform
description: A developer blog platform with MDX support, syntax highlighting, dark mode, and SEO optimization.
